text: Hello! How can I assist you today?

options.text: I want to ask something specific

text: That's great! Please go ahead and ask your question.
Sure, here's a joke: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
Would you like to hear another joke?
Here's another one: Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
Alright, feel free to ask if you have any more questions later. Have a great day!
No problem! If you ever change your mind, just let me know. Have a wonderful day!
Sure, please enter your specific question below.
I'll find the answer for you. Please wait...
Here is the answer to your question: {response}. Is there anything else I can help you with?
